segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t see the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, and she’s just standing there, one foot already soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how careless she’s being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to break his neck climbing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just as bad, encouraging him by waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really step in before this gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to flood if that sink doesn’t get turned off soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, so calm and orderly, while inside it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
